title: Withholding of income taxes
context: §88-94 Withholding of income taxes. Pension, annuity, and retirement allowance payments from the system shall be subject to income tax withholding requirements as set forth by the federal government; payment of these taxes as withheld shall be the liability of the system. The board of trustees shall adopt rules to administer the purposes of this section. [L 1966, c 11, §§2, 3; HRS §88-85; am L 1969, c 110, pt of §1; gen ch 1985; am L 2005, c 58, §1]
